short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want to get rid of Corona from your life and your web pages? Well, this extension will take care of the web pages part...atleast

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of reading Covid or Coronavirus word on every website you open. This extension will take care of that. Just download this and after enabling it, you will be able to browse the web free from "CORONAVIRUS".
